TopicTitle: Split the Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorial Sub-forum to Mod an un-Mod.

Articles.Content:
As per title.

Recently trying to help, but it seems that more and more people playing (Modded Install) and all kind of weird question appear.

Since already split the Support section of the forum for Mod and Un-Mod, why not implement it for Gameplay Questions and Tutorial.

That's a great suggestion. Splitting the tutorials might be good, too.

The only possible problem I see with it is if the old Gameplay Questions forum gets archived somewhere inaccessible, as happened when support got split. Most questions can be answered by a search of the current questions forum, hopefully that resource could be preserved somehow.
